madatlas.title: Cartography and Geospatial Analysis Internship
madatlas.description: Cartography and geospatial analysis of mobility and transport flows around the Andrainjato university campus for a secondary centrality

innovt.title: Frontend Developer Internship
innovt.description: Design and development of a customizable hotel management platform named HMS

arato.title: Angular Developer Internship
arato.description: Design and development of a grower tracking management application for Qimpexx Agri Sarl company

hotelManagement.title: Hotel Management System
hotelManagement.description: Complete multi-site hotel management system with landing page, admin interface and super-admin.
hotelManagement.fullDescription: Complete hotel management platform consisting of three distinct Angular 18 applications: (1) Landing page to present the solution to potential hotels, (2) Admin interface allowing hotels to customize their site (colors, menu, contact) and manage their bookings, (3) Public site for each hotel with reservation system integrating Stripe for payments, (4) Super-admin to manage all hotels using the platform. Modular architecture with dynamic variables for complete customization of each hotel site.

innovtLearning.title: InnovT Learning Hub
innovtLearning.description: Online registration platform for training courses offered by InnovT Madagascar.
innovtLearning.fullDescription: Modern website allowing users to easily register for the various training courses offered by InnovT Madagascar. Google authentication integration for smooth and secure user experience. Responsive and intuitive interface developed with React and Vite.

qimpexxAgri.title: Qimpexx Agri - Grower Tracking
qimpexxAgri.description: Web application for managing and tracking growers and plantations for Qimpexx Agri SARL.
qimpexxAgri.fullDescription: Design and development of an agricultural tracking application to manage growers, their lands, seedling requests and planting follow-up. The application also integrates a follow-up questionnaire system, as well as Excel data import and information export in Excel/CSV/PDF format. Completed during an internship at ARATO Fianarantsoa IT services company.

portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio
portfolio.description: Modern personal portfolio with 3D animations and multilingual support.
portfolio.fullDescription: Professional portfolio showcasing my skills and projects. Integrates Three.js for immersive 3D animations, i18n for multilingual support (French/English/Malagasy), and an elegant interface developed with React TypeScript and Vite. Responsive design and smooth animations.

facebookClone.title: Facebook Homepage Clone
facebookClone.description: Facebook homepage reproduction using HTML, CSS and vanilla JavaScript.
facebookClone.fullDescription: Personal project reproducing Facebook's homepage. This project demonstrates mastery of web development fundamentals: HTML5 for structure, CSS3 for styling and animations, and vanilla JavaScript for interactions. Responsive design and attention to detail.

contact.title: Contact

contact.description: I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations. Feel free to reach out to discuss your projects.
